PrivacyPolicy.Title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.Description: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how we handle your information.

Section1.Title: 1. Introduction
Section1.Content: Welcome to Calm.! We value your trust and prioritize your data security.

Section2.Title: 2. Information We Collect
Section2.Content: We collect personal data such as name, email, address, and payment details to provide our services.

Section3.Title: 3. How We Use Your Information
Section3.Content: We use your data to process subscriptions, deliver products, and communicate updates.

Section4.Title: 4. Sharing Your Information
Section4.Content: We share data only with necessary service providers and comply with legal obligations.

Section5.Title: 5. Your Rights
Section5.Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time.

Section6.Title: 6. Contact Us
Section6.Content: If you have questions, contact us at suport@calmystery.pt.

CookiePolicy.Title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicy.Description: Learn how we use cookies to enhance your experience and ensure the proper functioning of the website.

Section1.Title: What are Cookies?
Section1.Content: Cookies are small files stored on your device to improve functionality and analyze traffic.

Section2.Title: How We Use Cookies
Section2.Content: We use cookies to personalize your experience, analyze site usage, and provide recommendations.

Section3.Title: Types of Cookies
Section3.Content: We use essential, functional, performance, and advertising cookies for various purposes.

Section4.Title: Managing Cookies
Section4.Content: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.

Section5.Title: Third-Party Cookies
Section5.Content: Some cookies are provided by third-party services, such as Google Analytics, for analysis and advertising.

TermsConditions.Title: Terms and Conditions
TermsConditions.Description: Please read the terms and conditions before using our book mystery box services.

Section1.Title: Services Provided
Section1.Content: We offer mystery book boxes with various subscription plans tailored to your preferences.

Section2.Title: User Responsibilities
Section2.Content: Users are responsible for providing accurate information and keeping payment details up to date.

Section3.Title: Payment Policy
Section3.Content: Payments are processed at the beginning of each subscription cycle and are non-refundable.

Section4.Title: Cancellation Policy
Section4.Content: You can cancel at any time, but refunds are not available for the current month.

Section5.Title: Intellectual Property Rights
Section5.Content: All website content, including text and images, is protected by copyright.

PointSystem.FirstDesc: Trade your old books and earn points.
